channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fed clears KeyCorp‚Äôs $2 billion cash infusion from Scotiabank earlier than expected and its stock is up
item.description: Analyst hails Fed‚Äôs quicker-than-expected OK of the investment in KeyCorp from Bank of Nova Scotia as a good sign for more deal-making

item.title: Here's where the stock market is headed in 2025, according to Wall Street's top strategists
item.description: The S&P 500 is expected to end next year at 6,630, according to the average forecast from the CNBC Market Strategist Survey released Friday.

item.title: S&P 500 falls Friday, on track to snap a 3-week winning streak: Live updates
item.description: Stocks seesawed Friday, with the S&P 500 on pace for its first weekly decline in four weeks.

item.description: My wife is younger than I am, and longevity runs in both our families.

item.title: OpenAI says ChatGPT service has recovered after hours-long outage
item.description: OpenAI said service to its application programming interface, ChatGPT and Sora had been restored after not working for hours.

item.title: Europe stocks slip as investors react to economic data; French stocks reverse gains after new prime minister named
item.description: Investors were also reacting to disappointing economic data prints out of the U.K. and Germany.

item.title: Costco, boosted by traffic and digital sales, is well positioned for future gains, says Jefferies
item.description: Costco Wholesale Corp., which reported first-quarter results after market close Thursday, is well placed for future share gains, according to analyst firm Jefferies.

item.title: Elon Musk reveals SEC sent him 'settlement demand' after Twitter buyout probe
item.description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has issued a "settlement demand" to Elon Musk, the tech billionaire revealed in a social media post on Thursday.

item.title: Elon Musk reveals SEC sent him 'settlement demand' after Twitter buyout probe
item.description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has issued a "settlement demand" to Elon Musk, the tech billionaire revealed in a social media post on Thursday.

item.title: After historic NFL investment, private-equity firm Ares is on the hunt for more teams
item.description: Private-equity firms have been allowed to invest in NFL franchises for the first time, as the high cost of running teams is requiring more cash.

item.title: McKinsey & Company to pay $650 million to settle opioid consulting probe, ex-partner to plead guilty
item.description: The Department of Justice had investigated McKinsey & Company for its consulting work with Purdue Pharma, the prescription opioid maker.

item.title: Broadcom stock jumps 21%, pushing company past $1 trillion market cap for the first time
item.description: Shares of Broadcom popped more than 21% Friday, pushing the company's market cap beyond $1 trillion for the first time.

item.title: Junk bonds surprise with strong 2024 gains. But are they worth the risk in 2025?
item.description: The bond market risks remaining volatile in 2025, despite the burst of investor optimism about the economy following the U.S. presidential election.

item.title: Federal Reserve is likely to cut interest rates next week. Here's what that means for you
item.description: The third interest rate cut in a row is on deck, which is welcome news for consumers struggling to keep up with sky-high interest charges.

item.title: ‚ÄòIf Ukraine fails, war will come to the streets of European cities,‚Äô former foreign minister says
item.description: Ukraine "cannot sit on its hands" while Russia continues to escalate, Kuleba told CNBC.
